name: Space Corners
description:
You are an alien ass kicking butterfly defending earth against its greatest threat. But wait ! There is a catch, your navigation subsytems are broken and you can only use one of the ludicrous amount of button your spaceship used to have. 

You can only use your space bar to control your ship in this game. Navigate between 4 points to fight your way throuh waves of ennemies collecting powerup along the way to gain precious new weapon.

Authors:

Arthur Chiffoleau

Alexis Ehret

Raphaël Nodenot
